SEARCH
Package JavaSprint

Class Library

java.lang.Object
JavaSprint.Library
public class Library extends Object
The Library class represents a library system. It manages books, authors, and patrons.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Library()
    Constructs a Library object with empty lists for books, authors, and patrons.
